Posts.Content: Hello, my mom has lung cancer and was just given 6 months to live....she has a tumor to large to remove, underwent one chemo treatment that almost killed her. Please send me whatever infomation you have...I will gladly repay you any postage costs. My mailing address is: --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, personal information removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html --- She doesn't sleep, doesn't eat (much anyway), and is on Travcet??? spelling might be wrong. Please help. I am looking for some way to help her or at least make her quality of life better. Thank you in advance....Deb
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Had Success With Alternative Treatments?
